title: 50 Trillion Token Consumer-to-Enterprise Scale
summary: Built enterprise AI platform by first achieving massive consumer scale (172M MAU), then offering that infrastructure to external businesses

content.whatItIs: ByteDance's Doubao large language model usage grew more than tenfold in a single year. 'AI is being adopted at an unprecedented speed, and how to make better use of it has become a question all businesses have to answer well.'
howItWorks: Doubao's daily token usage: 50 trillion tokens/month, up from 4 trillion (12x increase in one year)
Volcano Engine accounts for 49.2% of AI model-focused public cloud services in China (IDC)
Enterprise customers: Mercedes-Benz, BYD, China Merchants Bank, Yuanfudao
Spring Festival Gala partnership (2026 CCTV): reached 700+ million viewers
Ocean team integrates hardware initiatives: Doubao phone, Ola Friend earbuds, AI glasses, plus acquired Smartisan, PICO, Oladance
content.coreInsight: Consumer-scale AI (hundreds of millions of MAUs) becomes enterprise infrastructure. By achieving massive scale in consumer applications first, platforms can offer battle-tested AI to enterprises with proven reliability. Organizing hardware initiatives under a unified team with acquired entities creates vertical integration for AI-native products.
content.keyMetrics: 172M MAUs (QuestMobile Q3 2025), surpassing DeepSeek's 144M. $23B AI infrastructure investment planned for 2026. Potential 20,000 NVIDIA H200 chip purchase.
